abstract: Ryan Palmer, Brooks Koepka and Greg Owen share first round lead at St Jude Classic golf tournament; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Palmer, Brooks Koepka and Greg Owen are tied at six-under-par 64 after the opening round of the St. Jude Classic.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Golf; Three Share Lead in Memphis

snippet: Ryan Palmer, Brooks Koepka and Greg Owen are tied at six-under-par 64 after the opening round of the St. Jude Classic.
